name: It's Ad-of-control
description:
Made for GMTK Jam 2020 'out of control' 

Match as many colours as you can using W,A,S,D.
Close the ad popups by clicking the 'X'

Forgive me lol - if anyone plays this I hope you get the gist.
The design i had in mind was you've followed a link to a web game and upon clicking play you loose the ability to close your browser and get bombarded with more and more ads.

Know issues

  • The 'X' to close ads is rendering behind the ad imags
  • The timer / game does not stop when the player looses
  • No way to pause or exit the game

Intended features

  • Penalisation for clicking the image of an ad
  • The colours change location
  • The the ads behave more manic as time continues
  • Some kind of audio
  • Screen effects
